column5: A friend raised a few pigs, one for me.   Ham sure tastes great compared to store's chemical injected junk! I smoked & chopped some bacon for the dip, I dug some leeks in the morning, figured fresh ham & leek dinner would be good,especially in this "tropical weather"   I made some leek dip,with leek bologna, crackers & swiss cheese, & "taters-R-rotten" ( Au Gratin), toss salad, & apple crisp ( sorry, only got a few pics)....
Well now I'm hungry  Looks good
That doesn't look too tasty...........NOT!! Like my littlest likes to say, I'M SNACKY!!
Now you have gone dun it! That's the nicest looking ham I have seen in a long time!
